files.patch:
@@ -208,0 +208,14 @@
+  # Setup libiconv flags and library
+  if test "x$OPENJDK_TARGET_OS" == "xaix" || test "x$OPENJDK_TARGET_OS" == "xmacosx"; then
+    ICONV_CFLAGS=
+    ICONV_LDFLAGS=
+    ICONV_LIBS=-liconv
+  else
+    ICONV_CFLAGS=
+    ICONV_LDFLAGS=
+    ICONV_LIBS=
+  fi
+  AC_SUBST(ICONV_CFLAGS)
+  AC_SUBST(ICONV_LDFLAGS)
+  AC_SUBST(ICONV_LIBS)
+

@@ -231,1 +231,2 @@
-          $(GIFLIB_CFLAGS) $(LIBJPEG_CFLAGS) $(PNG_CFLAGS) $(LIBZ_CFLAGS), \
+          $(GIFLIB_CFLAGS) $(LIBJPEG_CFLAGS) $(PNG_CFLAGS) $(LIBZ_CFLAGS) \
+          $(ICONV_CFLAGS), \
@@ -233,1 +234,2 @@
-          $(GIFLIB_CFLAGS) $(LIBJPEG_CFLAGS) $(PNG_CFLAGS) $(LIBZ_CFLAGS), \
+          $(GIFLIB_CFLAGS) $(LIBJPEG_CFLAGS) $(PNG_CFLAGS) $(LIBZ_CFLAGS) \
+          $(ICONV_CFLAGS), \
@@ -259,0 +261,1 @@
+      LDFLAGS := $(ICONV_LDFLAGS), \
@@ -262,1 +265,1 @@
-      LIBS := $(GIFLIB_LIBS) $(LIBJPEG_LIBS) $(LIBZ_LIBS) $(PNG_LIBS), \
+      LIBS := $(GIFLIB_LIBS) $(LIBJPEG_LIBS) $(LIBZ_LIBS) $(PNG_LIBS) $(ICONV_LIBS), \
@@ -265,1 +268,1 @@
-      LIBS_macosx := -liconv \
+      LIBS_macosx := \
@@ -271,1 +274,1 @@
-      LIBS_aix := $(LIBDL) -liconv $(X_LIBS) -lX11 -lXext, \
+      LIBS_aix := $(LIBDL) $(X_LIBS) -lX11 -lXext, \

@@ -38,0 +38,1 @@
+    CFLAGS := $(ICONV_CFLAGS), \
@@ -41,0 +42,1 @@
+    LDFLAGS := $(ICONV_LDFLAGS), \
@@ -42,0 +44,1 @@
+    LIBS := $(ICONV_LIBS), \
@@ -44,2 +47,2 @@
-    LIBS_aix := $(LIBDL) -liconv, \
-    LIBS_macosx := -liconv \
+    LIBS_aix := $(LIBDL), \
+    LIBS_macosx := \

@@ -56,1 +56,1 @@
-    CFLAGS := -DJDWP_LOGGING, \
+    CFLAGS := -DJDWP_LOGGING $(ICONV_CFLAGS), \
@@ -71,0 +71,1 @@
+    LDFLAGS := $(ICONV_LDFLAGS), \
@@ -76,0 +77,1 @@
+    LIBS := $(ICONV_LIBS), \
@@ -77,2 +79,0 @@
-    LIBS_macosx := -liconv, \
-    LIBS_aix := -liconv, \
